attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This parliament has abused it's position and brought the public offices held by MPs into disrepute.
The public displays of contrition are insufficent and tokenistic causing the electorate to lose faith. 
This parliament must be dissolved and new elections must take place on a platform of honesty and personal integrity.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
